document.full_text: a family of four, including a young girl and her teenage sister, were found dead on tuesday at their home in san diego, three of them in a swimming pool and one in a bathtub, police and fire officials said.
document.title: san diego family of 4 found dead in pool and bathtub
lines_and_colors: a family of four, including a young girl and her teenage sister, were found dead on tuesday at their home in san diego, three of them in a swimming pool and one in a bathtub, police and fire officials said.
